footer.platformDescription: The premium golf booking platform in Mexico. Discover the best courses and live unique experiences.

secondaryFooter.platformDescription: The premium platform for golf bookings in Mexico. Discover the best courses and live unique experiences.

heroSection.title: Premium Golf Reservations in
heroSection.subtitle: Book your perfect round at the finest golf courses in Los Cabos. Real-time availability, instant confirmation, and exclusive access.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Booking your perfect golf round in Los Cabos is simple and straightforward. Follow these easy steps to secure your tee time at world-class courses.

search.title: Search & Browse
search.description: Browse our curated selection of premium golf courses. Use filters to find courses that match your preferences and skill level.

select.title: Select Your Tee Time
select.description: Choose your preferred date and time from available slots shown in our real-time calendar.

pay.title: Secure Payment
pay.description: Complete your booking with our secure payment system. We protect your data and offer multiple payment options.

play.title: Play & Enjoy
play.description: Arrive at the course with your confirmation. Our 24/7 support team is available if you need any assistance.

cta.title: Ready to Book Your Round?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied golfers who trust TeeReserve for their Los Cabos golf experiences.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose TeeReserve?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: We're more than just a booking platform. We're your trusted partner in creating unforgettable golf experiences in one of the world's most beautiful destinations.

realTime.title: Real-Time Availability
realTime.description: See live availability and book instantly with immediate confirmation for all premium courses in Los Cabos.

bestRate.title: Best Rate Guarantee
bestRate.description: We guarantee the best rates available. Find a lower price elsewhere? We'll match it and give you 5% off.

premium.title: Premium Courses Only
premium.description: Access to 15+ championship golf courses including Jack Nicklaus, Tiger Woods, and Robert Trent Jones designs.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our golf experts are available around the clock to help you find the perfect tee time and answer any questions.

payment.title: Secure Payments
payment.description: Multiple payment options including Stripe, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay with bank-level security.

expertise.title: Local Expertise
expertise.description: Deep knowledge of Los Cabos golf courses with insider tips on course conditions, weather, and best times to play.

testimonials.title: What Our Golfers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. Hear from thousands of satisfied golfers who have experienced the best of Los Cabos golf through TeeReserve.

testimonials.name: Michael Rodriguez
testimonials.comment: Absolutely incredible experience! TeeReserve made booking so easy, and the course was spectacular. The oceanfront holes are unforgettable. Will definitely book again.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.comment: Tiger Woods designed course was amazing! The booking process was seamless, and the customer service was top-notch. Best golf vacation we've ever had.

testimonials.name: David Chen
testimonials.comment: The One&Only Palmilla course exceeded all expectations. TeeReserve's platform made it easy to compare options and book at the best rate. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Jennifer Williams
testimonials.comment: Fantastic service from start to finish. The course was in perfect condition, and the views were breathtaking. TeeReserve made our group booking effortless.

home.recommendationsSubtitle: AI recommendations based on your preferences

coursesPage.title: Find Your Next Round
coursesPage.description: Explore all available golf courses and book your next tee time in Los Cabos.
coursesPage.subtitle: Use the filters below to find the perfect course for your needs.

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Usage at TeeReserve Golf
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, personalize content, and analyze traffic. By clicking 'Accept All', you consent to the use of all cookies. You can manage your preferences individually.

necessary.title: Necessary
necessary.description: Always active, required for basic website functionality.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Help measure usage and improve performance.

helpPage.title: Help Center
helpPage.subtitle: We are here to help you with any questions about golf reservations at the best courses in Mexico.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp
whatsapp.description: Chat with us directly on WhatsApp for immediate support with your golf reservations.

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: Call us for personalized assistance with your reservations at premium golf courses.

email.title: Email
email.description: Send us an email, and we will respond in less than 24 hours with all the information you need.

questions.question: How can I make a reservation?
questions.answer: You can make a reservation by navigating to the 'Courses' section, selecting your favorite golf course, and clicking 'Book'. We will guide you step-by-step through the process of booking your perfect tee time.

questions.question: Can I cancel my reservation?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your reservation up to 24 hours before your tee time at no additional cost. For last-minute cancellations, please contact us directly, and we will assist you with the available options.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit and debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express) through our secure payment platform powered by Stripe.

questions.question: Do the prices include everything?
questions.answer: The prices shown include the basic green fee. Some courses may have additional costs for a golf cart, caddie, or premium services, which are clearly specified for each course.

questions.question: Can I change my reservation time?
questions.answer: Yes, you can modify your reservation subject to availability. We recommend contacting us as soon as possible to make changes to your tee time and secure your preferred schedule.

questions.question: Which golf courses are available?
questions.answer: We work with the best golf courses in Mexico, including Cabo del Sol, Palmilla Golf Club, Diamante Golf, TPC Danzante Bay, and many more premium courses in destinations like Los Cabos, La Paz, and Loreto.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: Have questions or want to collaborate with us?

form.title: Send us a Message
form.description: Complete the form and we will get back to you shortly.
form.errorMessage: Error sending message. Please try again.

errors.name: Name must be at least 2 characters
errors.message: Message must be at least 10 characters

mission.imageAlt: Detailed view of a pristine golf course

values.subtitle: The principles that guide our work and commitment to you.

passion.description: We are golfers serving golfers. We understand the details that make a round of golf perfect.

quality.title: Quality and Excellence
quality.description: We partner with the most exclusive and best-maintained courses to offer a premium experience.

trust.title: Trust and Security

team.title: Our Team
